Title: Relates to payments in lieu of taxes for property acquired for park or recreational purposes by the town of Hempstead
Summary: Extends from June 30, 2025 to June 30, 2027, the expiration of provisions of the town law relating to payments in lieu of taxes for property acquired for park or recreational purposes by the town of Hempstead.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 821 of the laws of 1970 amending the town law relating to payment in lieu of taxes for property acquired for park or recreational purposes by the town of Hempstead, in relation to the term of effectiveness of such chapter
